about_the_game:
V.E.D.A is a Soulslike training game where you can learn the unique battles of the Soulslike genre. To alleviate stress about death, V.E.D.A incorporates growth elements in the Roguelite genre, making it enjoyable not only for Soulslike fans but also for those who want to enter this genre. Dive into battles without hesitation. Uncover hidden secrets behind lost memories and survive in the training simulator.

【Hefty and Tense Soulslike Combat】


ㆍTrue to the Essence of Soulslike Combat
You can engage in combat through attacking and dodging, and by parrying and executing fatal attacks, you can easily overwhelm enemies. With a variety of weapons and armor to choose from, you can experience diverse battles with your own strategies.



ㆍAwakening Skill, Overclock
You can fill the Overclock gauge to initiate the awakening skill against enemies. The Overclock gauge can be obtained depending on various options included in items, so choose the timing of use carefully during combat and unleash powerful attacks.



ㆍOnerous Enemies and Bosses
Prepare for battles against bosses with the controls you've learned through training and the weapons and equipment you've acquired. They won't be easy. Clear the bosses to feel a great sense of accomplishment and unlock new chapters.

【Roguelite System】


ㆍRigorous Training to Become the Ultimate Combat Agent
V.E.D.A kindly guides you to become the best agent you can be. However, to become the best agent, you’ll need rigorous training. The training will only end once you clear all chapters without dying. Find ‘modules’ to unlock new equipment and enhancement elements, and strategically overcome constantly changing training situations.

ㆍProcedurally Generated Environment and Maps
The training program tests your ability to make quick and accurate decisions in various situations through procedurally generated maps, new enemies, hidden spaces, and various traps. While specific maps have fixed monster and item locations, the arrangement and combination of blocks are different in every gameplay, offering a fresh challenge every time. This program is designed to ultimately lead you to become the best agent.

【Weapons and Gear】


ㆍVarious Weapon Acquisition and Diverse Combat Combinations
Weapons and shields are acquired randomly, each with unique stats. Additionally, combining them with different gear offers a variety of combat experiences, allowing players to enjoy diverse fighting styles. Weapons, shields, and gear obtained during gameplay can be equipped immediately, giving players the enjoyable challenge of making strategic choices.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 3060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: V.E.D.A is a Soulslike training game with weighty combat and exploration. The protagonist, awakened with no memory, undergoes combat training in a training simulator and uncovers hidden secrets. You too can enter the Soulslike genre. Don't hesitate.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
